pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``aiobtclientapi`` is an asynchronous API for communicating with BitTorrentclients. It is a high-level wrapper around `aiobtclientrpc`_... _aiobtclientrpc: https://codeberg.org/plotski/aiobtclientrpcAll client-specific details are abstracted away as much as possible, but theindividual quirks of each client can still be accessed if necessary.| Documentation: https://aiobtclientapi.readthedocs.io/| Repository: https://codeberg.org/plotski/aiobtclientapi| Package: https://pypi.org/project/aiobtclientapi/License-------`GPLv3+ <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html>`_
